img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/57/Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg)| Steel Ginseng| Rare | Using the gourd, instantly gains a moderate amount of Focus | Randomly obtained from Aged Ginseng plants | Steel Ginseng
![Black-myth-wukong-sweet-ice.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/58/Black-myth-wukong-sweet-ice.jpg)| Sweet Ice| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Chill Resistance for a short duration | Found in New Thunderclap Temple, Temple Entrance in The New WestFollow the path towards the right and ahead and through the red gate Continue ahead and to the right through another red gate and up the stairs Take another right and look under a gazebo to find the Soak | Sweet Ice
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg)| Purple-Veined Peach Pit| Rare | Massively increases the Health recovery from using the gourd when at Critical Health | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed HollowHead towards the lanterns and take a right through the gate Located in the next area with the chests | Purple-Veined Peach Pit
![Black-myth-wukong-deathstinger.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e5/Black-myth-wukong-deathstinger.jpg)| Deathstinger (Soak)| Rare | For a short duration after using the gourd, inflicts Poisoned state to the Destined One himself | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating the Scorpion Prince enemy | Deathstinger (Soak)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 15 from the file 'Soaks.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/57/Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg)| Steel Ginseng| Rare | Using the gourd, instantly gains a moderate amount of Focus | Randomly obtained from Aged Ginseng plants | Steel Ginseng
![Black-myth-wukong-sweet-ice.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/58/Black-myth-wukong-sweet-ice.jpg)| Sweet Ice| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Chill Resistance for a short duration | Found in New Thunderclap Temple, Temple Entrance in The New WestFollow the path towards the right and ahead and through the red gate Continue ahead and to the right through another red gate and up the stairs Take another right and look under a gazebo to find the Soak | Sweet Ice"
            - Following Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Black-myth-wukong-purple-veined-peach-pit.jpg)| Purple-Veined Peach Pit| Rare | Massively increases the Health recovery from using the gourd when at Critical Health | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed HollowHead towards the lanterns and take a right through the gate Located in the next area with the chests | Purple-Veined Peach Pit
![Black-myth-wukong-deathstinger.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e5/Black-myth-wukong-deathstinger.jpg)| Deathstinger (Soak)| Rare | For a short duration after using the gourd, inflicts Poisoned state to the Destined One himself | Found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating the Scorpion Prince enemy | Deathstinger (Soak)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a tray containing red dried herbs, likely related to the game "Black Myth: Wukong." Based on the preceding and following text, this image is part of a series showcasing various items that players can obtain in the game. The items have different effects when used, such as increasing Focus, Chill Resistance, Health recovery, or inflicting a Poisoned state. This particular image is positioned between descriptions of "Sweet Ice" and "Purple-Veined Peach Pit," suggesting it represents another unique item with specific in-game benefits.
